Original_notes: fencing is for protection against animals, not to delimit property
(+); before warfare was suppressed by the British, the capital at least must have reached the size.
(+); Men's houses: "nothing more than open shelters, roofs supported on uprights."
salt production [underlined]; chiefs had monopolies of ivory and salt
Rather tribute, perhaps, than taxation in kind, but the line is fuzzy.
some only; The bakabilo are hereditary and cannot be deposed.
